/>
V.iii.10.3.c
.
Definition:  Unstable Scar
An
unstable scar
is a scar in which, for any reason, there is frequent loss of covering of skin over the scar.
Reference
:  For more information on unstable scars, see
38 CFR 4.118, DC 7804
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 10 - Skin Conditions
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 10, Section None
